items.sentence: I think that I need to ask Tom what he thinks.
I\'d like to know why you didn\'t wait for me.
Where did you get the money to buy that dress?
I\'ll bet you didn\'t sleep a wink last night.
When I first met Tom, I didn\'t like him much.
Tom enjoyed himself at the dance last weekend.
Tom enjoyed playing baseball with his friends.
Tom is the only one who didn\'t pass the test.
Tom and his grandfather communicate in French.
How do you protect your computer from viruses?
